triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The primary method reviewed in this paper for solving control and optimization problems in power systems.

triples.relevance: The main application domain for reinforcement learning methods discussed in the survey.

triples.relevance: Key emerging technology in modern power systems that creates challenges addressed by RL approaches.
